controller.name: sequence
controller.explanation: execute sub tasks sequentially in a predetermined order to achieve step-by-step completion of complex tasks
controller.pattern: ^(sequen.*?|progressively).*(execute|step by step|in order|in sequence|carry out|gradually|one by one)$
^(execut.*?|perform.*?|order|operat.*?|implement.*?).*(step by step|in order|in sequence|gradually|one by one)$
